trans-unit.source: Describes a change in the scrolling state and contains the required arguments for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 描述了滚动状态更改，并包含的必需的参数<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取更新后的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>扩展盘区。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated extent height.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，它表示更新的区高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示高度更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>扩展盘区。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in extent height.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，表示范围高度的更改。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取更新后的宽度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>扩展盘区。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated extent width.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示更新的区宽度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示的宽度更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>扩展盘区。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in extent width.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，表示范围宽度的更改。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示的水平偏移量更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示的水平偏移量更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated horizontal offset value for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取更新的水平偏移量的值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated value of the horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示的水平偏移量的更新的值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Performs proper type casting before invoking the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref> delegate
trans-unit.target: 执行正确的类型强制转换，然后再调用类型安全<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref>委托

trans-unit.source: If you provide either the `genericHandler` or `genericTarget` as a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供以下任一`genericHandler`或`genericTarget`为 null 引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to invoke, in this case the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序来调用，在这种情况下<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref>委托。

trans-unit.source: The target upon which the `genericHandler` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在其目标`genericHandler`调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示的垂直偏移量更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示的垂直偏移量更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the vertical offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取更新后的值的垂直偏移量<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示的已更新的垂直偏移量<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取更新后的值的视区高度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated viewport height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，它表示的已更新的视区高度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in value of the viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示值的视区高度更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in vertical viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，表示垂直视区高度更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的视区宽度更新后的值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated value of the viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示的视区宽度更新后的值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in viewport width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示的视区宽度的更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，表示在视区宽度的更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>
